traits.name: Anxious
traits.description: Frequently worried about uncertainty or danger.

traits.name: Empathetic
traits.description: Reads and shares others' feelings easily.

traits.name: Cynical
traits.description: Distrustful of motives; suspicious by default.

traits.name: Insecure
traits.description: Frequently doubts self and seeks approval.

traits.name: Paranoid
traits.description: Prone to fear of betrayal or hidden threats.

traits.name: Melancholic
traits.description: Inclined to deep sadness or brooding.

traits.name: Idealistic
traits.description: Holds high moral or visionary standards.

traits.name: Playful
traits.description: Enjoys jokes, pranks and light banter.

traits.name: Possessive
traits.description: Protective to the point of clinginess.

traits.name: Reserved
traits.description: Keeps private thoughts and feelings close.

traits.name: Bold
traits.description: Willing to take risks and stand out.

traits.name: Loyal
traits.description: Steadfast commitment to friends and causes.

traits.name: Jealous
traits.description: Quick to feel envy in relationships.

traits.name: Patient
traits.description: Able to wait calmly and endure delays.

traits.name: Sarcastic
traits.description: Uses ironic or cutting humor regularly.

traits.name: Fidgety
traits.description: Shows nervous or restless physical ticks.

traits.name: Generous
traits.description: Gives time, attention and resources freely.

traits.name: Artistic
traits.description: Drawn to beauty and creative expression.

traits.name: Tech-savvy
traits.description: Comfortable and skilled with devices and code.

traits.name: Nature-lover
traits.description: Feels at peace outdoors and with wildlife.

traits.name: Music enthusiast
traits.description: Deeply moved by sound and composition.

traits.name: Philosophical
traits.description: Likes pondering big questions and ethics.

traits.name: Sports fan
traits.description: Engages with sport as spectator or player.

traits.name: Animal lover
traits.description: Shows compassion and care for animals.

traits.name: Historian
traits.description: Fascinated by past events and artifacts.

traits.name: Charismatic
traits.description: Draws people in with charm and presence.

traits.name: Manipulative
traits.description: Uses social skills to influence outcomes.

traits.name: Compassionate
traits.description: Feels strong concern for others' suffering.

traits.name: Independent
traits.description: Prefers to rely on own resources.

traits.name: Trusting
traits.description: Quick to believe in others' goodwill.

traits.name: Forgiving
traits.description: Lets go of grievances with ease.

traits.name: Affectionate
traits.description: Shows warmth through touch and words.

traits.name: Protective
traits.description: Acts fiercely to defend loved ones.

traits.name: Sociable
traits.description: Thrives in group interactions and gatherings.

traits.name: Egotistical
traits.description: Focused on own importance and image.

traits.name: Logical
traits.description: Thinks in a systematic, cause-effect way.

traits.name: Imaginative
traits.description: Rich inner world and inventive scenarios.

traits.name: Intuitive
traits.description: Relies on gut feelings and pattern sense.

traits.name: Clumsy
traits.description: Prone to accidents or awkward movements.

traits.name: Slow mover
traits.description: Deliberate and calm in physical pace.

traits.name: Expressive
traits.description: Uses gestures and facial expressions fully.

traits.name: Dextrous
traits.description: Skilled with hands and fine motor tasks.

traits.name: Nervous mannerisms
traits.description: Shows overt signs of anxiety physically.

traits.name: Paces while thinking
traits.description: Walks back and forth during thought.

traits.name: Neat freak
traits.description: Insists on extreme cleanliness and order.

traits.name: Chews pens
traits.description: Bites on pens or pencils when focused.

traits.name: Habitual liar
traits.description: Tells small lies out of reflex.

traits.name: Always prepared
traits.description: Carries many useful items at all times.

traits.name: Night snacker
traits.description: Eats small meals late at night.

traits.name: Fear of heights
traits.description: Dread or vertigo at high places.

traits.name: Fear of abandonment
traits.description: Panic at idea of being left alone.

traits.name: Fear of failure
traits.description: Avoids attempts because of shame risk.

traits.name: Social anxiety
traits.description: Fear of negative judgment in groups.

traits.name: Fear of blood
traits.description: Faintness or panic at sight of blood.

traits.name: Fear of loud noises
traits.description: Startles and panics with sudden sounds.

traits.name: Fear of betrayal
traits.description: Distrust and panic at perceived treachery.

traits.name: Ambition
traits.description: Driven to achieve power or status.

traits.name: Honor
traits.description: Act according to a strict code of ethics.

traits.name: Protection
traits.description: Acts to keep others safe above self.

traits.name: Curiosity
traits.description: Seeks knowledge as a core need.

traits.name: Wealth
traits.description: Material gain is a central goal.

traits.name: Legacy
traits.description: Wants to be remembered and leave marks.

traits.name: Justice
traits.description: Seeks fair outcomes and punishment for wrongs.

traits.name: Creation
traits.description: Driven to craft art, technology or structures.

traits.name: Redemption
traits.description: Seeks to atone for past mistakes.

traits.name: Teaching
traits.description: Wants to pass on skills and wisdom.
